actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for the rotation of membership on the Committee on Appropriations.

summary.text: Amends rule X of the Rules of the House of Representatives to prohibit any Representative from serving as a member of the Committee on Appropriations during more than three Congresses in any period of five successive Congresses. Requires that selections to such committee be made without regard to seniority.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Rules of the House of Representatives to provide for the rotation of membership on the Committee on Appropriations.
